com.ibasco.agql.core

Class NettyChannelContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibasco.agql.core.NettyChannelContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MasterServerChannelContext, SourceRconChannelContext

    @ApiStatus.Internal
public class NettyChannelContext
extends Object
implements Closeable, Cloneable
    The context attached to a Channel instance
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

      • close

        public void close()
        Close or release the underlying Channel of this context. If the Channel is not pooled, it will call ChannelOutboundInvoker.close() otherwise it will attempt to call release to return it back to the pool.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
